des: "Fluffy, rich, and delicious, this mousse is a perfectly sweet, authentic Cuban dessert!"
ins: Puree the mangoes, honey, and lime juice in a blender or food processor until smooth.  Whip the heavy cream to soft peaks, and fold into the mango puree.  Beat egg whites in a clean dry bowl until stiff, then stir half into the mango mixture.  When well blended, gently fold the remaining egg white into the mousse until no streaks remain.
